title: Holding Onto My Man - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Romance   Xianxia   Yaoi
tags: Amnesia   Ancient China   Apocalypse   Comedic Undertone   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Episodic   Fated Lovers   Forced into a Relationship   Forced Living Arrangements   Gamers   Handsome Male Lead   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Humanoid Protagonist   Immortals   Interdimensional Travel   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lovers Reunited   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Master-Disciple Relationship   Mob Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Older Love Interests   Past Plays a Big Role   Possessive Characters   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   Revenge   R*pe   Ruthless Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Unconditional Love   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping   Zombies
author: Hong Yao Yao   红妖妖
description:
After an accidental death, in order to continue to live, Gu Bai had to choose to go through various wonderful books to complete tasks.

Every time he became a variety of small cannon fodder inside the story, Gu Bai’s code of conduct when completing task is – by all means, don’t be inferior, don’t be shameless, don’t be upright… hold on to a golden thigh.

… N times after transmigrating

Cannon fodder: (angry contempt) … You’re already so powerful, why are you still shamelessly holding on to a golden thigh to deal with us!?

Gu Bai: (deadpan) That… holding and holding… got used to it…>
